func.title: PV_Step

param.name: step
param.desc: Increase per each step (usually one frame, see the delay-parameter).

param.name: start_value
param.desc: Value that will be added to the current step-value.

param.name: delay
param.desc: Delay in frames for every step (defaults to 1).

param.name: maximumValue
param.desc: If not 0, the returned value will be capped at this value and not increase further.

func.desc: PV_Step can be used for values that do not depend on the particle age (unlike f.e. PV_Linear).
func.remark: See the particle documentation for further explanations of the particle system.
